## Plain Pytorch with fastai

```
library(fastai)
library(magrittr)

data = DataLoaders_(train_loader, test_loader)

learn = Learner(data, Net(), loss_func = F$nll_loss, 
                opt_func = Adam(), metrics = accuracy, cbs = CudaCallback())

learn %>% fit_one_cycle(1, 1e-2)
```
